data.name: RPG Sounds - Adventurer's Guild - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Adventurer's Guild is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Reminiscence From The Paths
  • The Unknown
  • Through The Dune

SFX
  • Board Squeal (5)
  • Giant Pain (6)
  • Axe Flesh (4)
  • Axe Metal (4)
  • Axe Wood (4)
  • Hammer Flesh (4)
  • Hammer Metal (4)
  • Hammer Wood (4)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
